languages.text: "Должен отметить, что ваши... потаенные чертоги отменно замаскированы". {n}В голосе дознавателя звенит нотка ревности, словно его задело то, что он так и не сумел отыскать жрецов.{/n} "И выбор тактики вполне разумен — лишние жертвы на фоне устроенной культистами резни совершенно напрасны".

"I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."
languages.original_text: "Должен отметить, что ваши... потаенные чертоги отменно замаскированы". {n}В голосе дознавателя звенит нотка ревности, словно его задело то, что он так и не сумел отыскать жрецов.{/n} "И выбор тактики вполне разумен — лишние жертвы на фоне устроенной культистами резни совершенно напрасны".

traits.locale_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, like he is upset about ultimately failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists had wrought."

There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists had wrought."

There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

"I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

"I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

languages.text: "Ich muss die Fachkenntnisse loben, mit denen Eure Geheimräume verborgen sind." {n}Du erkennst einen Hauch von verletztem Stolz in Heinrix' Worten, als würde er sich ärgern, dass er den Unterschlupf des Elektropriesters nicht gefunden hat.{/n} "Auch Eure gewählte Taktik war sehr klug. Wozu mehr Leben bei dem von den Kultisten angerichteten Massaker opfern?"
languages.original_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss die Fachkenntnisse loben, mit denen Eure Geheimräume verborgen sind." {n}Du erkennst einen Hauch von verletztem Stolz in Heinrix' Worten, als würde er sich ärgern, dass er den Unterschlupf des Elektropriesters letztlich nicht gefunden hat.{/n} "Auch Eure gewählte Taktik war sehr klug. Wozu mehr Leben bei dem von den Kultisten angerichteten Massaker opfern?"

languages.text: « Je dois reconnaître que vous êtes doués pour dissimuler vos salles secrètes. » {n}Vous décelez une pointe d'orgueil blessé dans la voix d'Heinrix, comme s'il s'en voulait de ne pas avoir découvert l'abri des électro-prêtres.{/n} « Votre tactique était elle aussi finement choisie. Il n'y aurait eu aucun intérêt à perdre plus de vies dans le massacre provoqué par les cultistes. »
languages.original_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois reconnaître que vous êtes doués pour dissimuler vos salles secrètes. » {n}Vous décelez une pointe d'orgueil blessé dans la voix d'Heinrix, comme s'il s'en voulait de ne pas avoir découvert l'abri des électroprêtres.{/n} « Votre tactique était elle aussi finement choisie. Il n'y aurait eu aucun intérêt à perdre plus de vies dans le massacre provoqué par les cultistes. »

languages.text: “我必须承认，你们隐藏密室的技巧非常出色。”{n}你从海因里希的话语中听出了自尊心受伤的意味。他似乎由于未能发现电僧的庇护所，始终对此耿耿于怀。{/n}“你选择的战术也非常明智，确实没必要在邪教徒的大屠杀中损失更多生命。”
languages.original_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

traits.locale_text: “我必须承认，你们隐藏密室的技巧非常出色。”{n}你从海因里希的话语中听出了自尊心受伤的意味。他似乎由于未能发现驭电祭司的庇护所，始终耿耿于怀。{/n}“你选择的战术也非常明智，确实没必要在邪教徒的大屠杀中损失更多生命。”

languages.text: 「秘密の部屋を隠す能力については、称賛せねばならないようですね」{n}エレクトロ・プリーストのシェルターを発見できなかったことに苛立っているのか、ハインリックスの言葉からは僅かにプライドが傷ついているのが聞き取れる。{/n}「御身の戦術選択も賢明でした。狂信者が起こした殺戮で、多くの人命を失う意味はありませんでしたから」
languages.original_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

traits.locale_text: 「秘密の部屋を隠す能力については、称賛せねばならないようだ」{n}結局エレクトロ・プリーストのシェルターを発見できなかったことに苛立っているのか、ハインリックスの言葉からは僅かにプライドが傷ついているのが聞き取れる。{/n}「あなたの戦術選択も賢明だったがな。魔女団が起こした殺戮で、多くの人命を失う意味はなかった」

languages.text: «Debo elogiar la destreza con la que han ocultado sus cámaras secretas». {n}Las palabras de Heinrix denotan cierto orgullo herido, como si estuviera molesto por no haber encontrado el refugio de los electrosacerdotes.{/n} «Las tácticas utilizadas también fueron las acertadas. No tenía sentido perder más vidas en la masacre que las que causaron los cultistas».
languages.original_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

traits.locale_text: «Debo elogiar la destreza con la que ha ocultado sus cámaras secretas». {n}Las palabras de Heinrix denotan cierto orgullo herido, como si estuviera molesto por no haber encontrado el refugio de los electrosacerdotes.{/n} «Las tácticas utilizadas también fueron las acertadas. No tenía sentido perder más vidas en la masacre que las que causaron los cultistas».

languages.text: "Gizli odalarınızı gözlerden uzak tutmak konusundaki becerinizi takdir ediyorum." {n}Heinrix'in sözlerinde, Elektro Rahiplerin sığınağını bulamamış olmaktan dolayı incinen gururunun tınısı mevcut.{/n} "Taktiksel seçimleriniz de akıllıcaymış. Tarikatçıların amaçladığı şey katliam zaten, daha fazla kurban verilmesinin bir manası olmazmış."
languages.original_text: "I must commend the skill with which your secret chambers are concealed." {n}You hear a tinge of wounded pride in Heinrix's words, as if he is upset about failing to discover the Electro-Priests' shelter.{/n} "Your choice of tactics was wise as well. There was no point in losing more lives in the massacre that the cultists wrought."

traits.locale_text: "Gizli odalarınızı gözlerden uzak tutmak konusundaki becerinizi takdir ediyorum." {n}Heinrix'in sözlerinde Elektro Rahiplerin sığınağını keşfetmekte başarısız olduğu için gururunun incindiğine dair belirtiler duyabiliyorsun.{/n} "Taktiksel seçimleriniz de akıllıcaymış. Tarikatçıların amaçladığı şey katliam zaten, daha fazla yaşamın kaybedilmesinin bir manası olmazmış."
